page.title: 06A Day in School
page.content: By Lorraine Osborne I get up in the morning at 7 o'clock. I get dressed and have breakfast,then we put our coats on and my sister and I have a race. I always beat her to school.When we get to school,I take my coat off and hang my bag up and go in the class.I get my book out and get on with my work.I work on until playtime. Three bells go and we have to go out to play.I play ball with Emily and Trisha.When the bell rings,we all go back to our classes and we do some number work or something.Then the bell goes for dinner and we all get our lunch boxes and line up by the door. We go into the hall and have our lunch.When we finish our lunch we go out to play.We have about 40 minutes play and then the bell goes for work and we all go to work for about an hour,when it is afternoon play.
